ComicInfo.Summary:
Kyra and her friends face off against unholy demonic evil while Merisiel's morals are tested... as Ezren's life hangs in the balance! Come see why Pathfinder is the industry's best-selling fantasy tabletop game. Each issue features an EXCLUSIVE removable, playable tactical map and poster!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Genzoman | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Carlos Gomez & Ross A. Campbell | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Sean Izaakse & Ross A. Campbell | 3 | RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Cover | Steve Ellis | 4 | LE | Ultra-Limited Edition Cover | Steven Cummings & Tamra Bonvillain | 5 |
